title: There is this Thiest swimming in the ocean.
body:
All of the sudden he sees this shark in the water, so he starts swimming towards his boat.

As he looks back he sees the shark turn and head towards him. His boat is a ways off and he starts swimming like crazy. He's scared to death, and as he turns to see the jaws of the great white beast open revealing its teeth in a horrific splendor, the theist screams, "Oh God! Save me!" 

The shark eats him.

:^)
